links.title: Press Release: Gorilla Technology Announces Acquisition of XYZ Tech
links.content:
[Skip to content](#content)

[ ![](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Gorilla-Technology-Logo-White-Text.svg) ](https://www.gorilla-technology.com)

  * [Industries](#Hero)
    *       *         * #### Industries we empower

We are dedicated to creating smarter and safer cities. 

      *         * [Gorilla Smart and Safe City](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/industries/smart-and-safe-city/)
        * [Government & Public Services](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/industries/smart-and-safe-city/government-and-public-services/)
        * [Buildings & Offices](/industries/buildings-and-offices/)
        * [Transportation & Logistics](/industries/transportation-and-logistics/)
        * [Commerce](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/industries/smart-and-safe-city/commerce/)
        * [Healthcare](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/industries/smart-and-safe-city/healthcare-industries/)
  * [Offerings](#)
    *       *         * #### Our Offerings

Gorilla is here to help. 

      *         * [Building & Office Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-building-solutions/)
        * [Policing Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-policing-solutions/)
        * [Railways Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-railways-solutions/)
        * [Road Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-road-solutions/)
        * [Port Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-port-solutions/)
      *         * [Airport Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-airport-solutions/)
        * [Healthcare Infrastructure Security Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-healthcare-infrastructure-security-solutions/)
        * [Safe Schools & Universities Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/safe-schools-and-universities-solutions/)
        * [Retail Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-retail-solutions/)
        * [Parking Solutions](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/offerings/smart-parking-solutions/)
  * Technologies
    *       *         * #### Technologies That Empower

Our technology unlocks transformational solutions. 

      *         * [Edge AI](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/edge-ai/)
      *         * [Video Analytics](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/video-analytics/)
          * [IVAR](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/video-analytics/ivar/)
          * [EVMS](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/video-analytics/evms/)
          * [Post Event](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/video-analytics/post-event/)
          * [iCCTV](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/video-analytics/icctv/)
      *         * [Security Convergence](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-convergence/)
          * [NetProbe](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-convergence/netprobe/)
          * [NetTrap](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-convergence/nettrap/)
          * [Host-based Malware Detection](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-convergence/hmd/)
          * [FR-MOTP](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-convergence/fr-motp/)
          * [Security Convergence Platform](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-convergence/scp/)
          * [Security Operations Centers](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/technologies/security-operations-center/)
  * [Resources](#Hero)
    * [Customer Success](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/customer-success/)
    * [Whitepapers](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/whitepapers/)
    * [Events](https://www.gorilla-technology.com/events/)
